title: Calories in a Cinnamon Roll
meta_description: Discover calories in cinnamon roll, including carbs, sugars, fat, protein, and full nutrition breakdown per serving with tweaks and FAQs.
assumptions: Standard store-bought cinnamon roll with cream cheese icing, about 100 g; baked, no nuts or extra fillings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, recipe, size, and preparation method. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: One cinnamon roll provides ~350 kcal, mostly from carbs and sugars.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in one cinnamon roll?
faqs.a: About 350 kcal for a standard iced cinnamon roll.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in a cinnamon roll?
faqs.a: Roughly 50 g carbs, including 25 g sugars and 1 g fiber.

faqs.q: Are cinnamon rolls high in fat?
faqs.a: Yes, about 12 g total fat with 5 g saturated per roll.

faqs.q: How does icing affect calories in cinnamon roll?
faqs.a: Icing adds ~100 kcal; skipping it reduces to ~250 kcal.

faqs.q: What's the protein in a cinnamon roll?
faqs.a: Around 5 g protein per standard roll.
